mapper.sql: a.id, a.flow_id as "flow.id", b.flowName as "flow.flowName", a.pro_id as "process.id", c.proName as "process.proName", c.proCode as "process.proCode", c.proDesc as "process.proDesc", a.sort, a.del_flag, a.remarks, a.create_by as "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by as "updateBy.id", a.update_date
left join tec_flow b on b.id=a.flow_id left join tec_process c on c.id=a.pro_id
mapper.select:
select
from tec_flow_process a
where del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
order by a.sort
mapper.insert: insert into tec_flow_process( id, flow_id, pro_id, sort, del_flag, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date )values( #{id}, #{flow.id}, #{process.id}, #{sort}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: update tec_flow_process set flow_id=#{flow.id}, pro_id=#{process.id}, sort=#{sort}, update_by=#{updateBy.id}, update_date=#{updateDate} where id=#{id}
